venue.name: Scibelli Enterprise Center, Across from STCC, downstairs media room

item.description:
Breaking News !

The speaker at out next Public (open) meeting will be Michael A. Blake, a Patent Attorney with extensive knowledge in many aspects of inventing! His background in law, teaching, mechanical engineering and other fields make this a meeting not to be missed. 
Open Public Meeting is Oct. 5, Wednesday at the usual time and place (Springfield).

Open Public Meetings are FREE for both members and for the public at large. Please pass the word around to anyone who might benefit from listening to an experienced Patent Attorney.
item.name: Oct. Meeting - Public Meeting with Speaker Michael A. Blake, Patent Attorney
